# useEditorPositioner

Adds an effect which positions an editor.

## Parameters

| Param    | Type     | Description                          |
| -------- | -------- | ------------------------------------ |
| ref      | `Object` | React reference to the editor.       |
| buttonId | `string` | the ID of the editor trigger button. |
| trackId  | `string` | the ID of the track element.         |

## Example

```js
import {useRef} from 'react';
import {useEditorPositioner} from '@bluecateng/pelagos';

const Example = () => {
	const editorRef = useRef(null);
	useEditorPositioner(editorRef, 'button', 'track');
	return <div ref={editorRef}>...</div>;
};
```
